issue.title: [Rust] [Parquet] Pin specific parquet-format-rs version
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11187](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11187). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We released paquet-format-rs v2.7.0, which has some incomatibilities with v2.6.x, so we should pin to the latter version.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11187?focusedCommentId=17261544) by Andrew Lamb (alamb):*
Issue resolved by pull request 9138
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/9138>
